gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka

Class ConfluentKafkaSchemaRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.kafka.KafkaSchemaRegistry<Integer,Schema>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka.ConfluentKafkaSchemaRegistry

  • public class ConfluentKafkaSchemaRegistry
extends KafkaSchemaRegistry<Integer,Schema>
    Extension of KafkaSchemaRegistry that wraps Confluent's SchemaRegistryClient.

    While Confluent's Schema Registry Client API provides more functionality that Gobblin's KafkaSchemaRegistry, most of the methods are not necessary for Gobblin's Kafka Adaptor. Thus only a subset of the SchemaRegistryClient methods are used.

    Like the KafkaSchemaRegistry this class allows fetching a Schema by a unique Integer id that uniquely identifies the Schema. It is also capable of fetching the latest Schema for a topic.
